newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Three S.African gold mines warn further.
newsitem.headline: Three S.African gold mines warn further.

text.p: Durban Roodepoort Deep Ltd, Buffelsfontein Gold Mines Ltd and Blyvooruitzicht Gold Mining Co Ltd said on Wednesday proposals were still under consideration which could materially affect their share prices.
Shareholders were advised to exercise caution in their share dealings until further notice.
No further details were given in the announcement.
Randgold and Exploration Co Ltd confirmed last month that its Durban Roodepoort mine was considering making an offer for Buffelsfontein and Blyvooruitzicht.
